tasks.task: Gardening and planting activities at a garden bed.
subtasks: Identify and prepare planting locations for blue lobelias and Proven Winners Truffle of Pink Domfrina.
Plant blue lobelias in existing gardenbeds, ensuring proper spacing and depth.
Examine and likely prepare soil in garden bed by tilling or similar methods.
Examine and prepare garden bed to interplant foxglove and Proven Winners Truffle of Pink Domfrina.
Discuss pollinator benefits of Proven Winners Truffle of Pink Domfrina (imagined subtask).
Potting and transplanting steps for foxglove seedlings (imaginary/sub/cultural note).
Water newly planted flowers to ensure proper settling and hydration.
Consider future plant care strategies, including fertilization and deadheading (non-actionable).

tasks.task: Planting and arranging annuals and perennials in garden borders.
subtasks: Determine placement of Proven Winners Truffle of Pink Domfrina in relation to existing foxglove and hydrangea.
Consider earlier interplanting techniques with foxglove and their effect on subsequent blooms.
Examine performance of remaining lobelias from previous years and plan for their future.
Plan for future propagation of lubelias via harvesting dried material for wreath making.

tasks.task: Addressing new garden elements and experimental plantings.
subtasks: Assess potential locations for Proven Winners Truffle of Pink Domfrina beyond existing garden beds.
Examine the impact of light and soil conditions on plant growth in different areas of the garden.
Introduce new peonies into the garden and discuss spacing requirements for optimal air circulation.

tasks.task: Pest and environment observation in a garden setting.
subtasks: Monitor for garden pests such as gnats affecting peonies.
Check on existing plants like peonies and hydrangea for signs of health and excessive growth.

tasks.task: Managing a small dog's care while gardening.
subtasks: Briefly check-in on puppies' health and needs when the narrator must tend to gardening activities.

tasks.task: Video production and sharing of gardening practices.
subtasks: Answer questions or provide tips to viewers in the comment section.
Share gardening resources like local nurseries and previous videos on related topics (e.g., peony care in the South).
